meanings.meaning: Nancy Drew Dossier : Lights, Camera, Curses (PC)

vlive.korean: 카메라 욕심 있어! They are greedy for the camera! 듣기 View video AB6IX : 영민이의 '몰래라이브 #1'
vlive.english: They are greedy for the camera!

vlive.korean: [카메라 빠염] 어머 너무 귀여워! [Bye camera!] This is so cute! 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 전생 체험하다가 죽음을 경험한 로켓펀치 연희 #아이돌 #리얼리티 ┃로켓펀치 [펀치타임
1, 2, 3 찰칵~ - 카메라 어디죠? One, two, three. Click! - Where is the camera? 듣기 View video NU'EST : 뉴이스트와 스푼즈가 함께하는 Special V LIVE [THE NU'STORE]
vlive.english: One, two, three. Click! - Where is the camera?

vlive.korean: 여기 카메라 봐요 - 어디 봐야 돼? There. Here, the camera. - Where should I look? 듣기 View video TWICE : TWICE TV “34th Golden Disc Awards DAY 2”
vlive.english: There. Here, the camera. - Where should I look?

vlive.korean: 근데 좀 카메라 앞에서는 낯설긴 해요 그렇죠? Still, I feel shy in front of cameras. Right? 듣기 View video MAMAMOO : 🌙달이 태양을 가릴 때🌙
vlive.english: Still, I feel shy in front of cameras. Right?

examples.korean: models pouting their lips for the camera 듣기 Add to Wordbook 카메라를 향해 입술을 불룩 내밀고 있는 모델들 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: models pouting their lips for the camera Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The camera panned back to the audience. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 카메라가 다시 이동하여 방청객 쪽을 보여주었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The camera panned back to the audience. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He panned the camera along the row of faces. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 카메라로 죽 늘어선 얼굴들을 보여주었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He panned the camera along the row of faces. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We watched the events unroll before the cameras. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 그 사건들이 카메라 앞에서 펼쳐지는 것을 지켜보았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We watched the events unroll before the cameras. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The players strutted and posed for the cameras. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 선수들은 뽐내며 걸어 나와 카메라를 향해 포즈를 취했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The players strutted and posed for the cameras. Add to Wordbook
